title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Learner-Centered Academic Library LibGuides Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental information retrieval skills and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: The LibGuides content structure can be designed by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation)
An optimized LibGuides navigation system for mathematics researchers can be structured based on learner analysis
A learner-centered LibGuides prototype applicable to real-world contexts can be developed through project-based assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
